title: Salt baked seabass with a fennel salad
description: Whole seabass baked in a salt crust served with a delicious potted shrimp, lemon and radish salad.
ingredients: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
2kg/4lb 8oz sea bass, scaled, gutted and fins removed
1 fennel head, sliced finely, lengthways on a Japanese mandoline
small bunch dill, picked into large fronds
